content: संभृ {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To collect, hoard, place or bring together; त्यागाय संभृतार्थानां <ls>R. 1. 7</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 5</ls>; <ls n="R.">8. 3</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 80.</ls> {@--2@} To effect, produce, bring on, accomplish; सुरतश्रमसंभृतो मुखे ( स्वेदलवः) <ls>R. 8. 51</ls>; <ls>Ki. 9. 49</ls>; <ls>Me. 115</ls> {@--3@} To maintain, cherish, foster. {@--4@} To make ready, prepare; <ls>V. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 54.</ls> {@--5@} To give, offer, present.
